name: PewDiePie's Rune
description:
Subscribe to PewDiePie

This is a fan game.

This game was made for PewDiePie in 2 weeks.

This game was made for the sub-bot war 2019 for PewDiePie.

This is a game made for PewDiePie.

This game is about YouTuber named PewDiePie.

PewDiePie needs to save YouTube and get 100 Million subscribers.

This game is a platformer PewDieGame.

I wanted to make this for the sub-bot war 2019.

So PewDiePie needs a new computer and a gaming one he only has 1 computer and it's broken PewDiePie needs to save the world.

If there's any bugs please email me I will fix them.

I really what PewDiePie to play this game Please. 

  • Operating System: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11.
  • Storage: 1GB
  • Operating System: 64-bi Windows 10.
  • Processor: Intel Core INTEL Core i9-9900K Processor  
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM.
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12.
  • Storage: 2GB
